snippet: With a Hemingwayesque build and the distinctively rounded vowels of his native Australia, the Time art critic Robert Hughes became as familiar a presence on television as he was in print.
abstract: With a Hemingwayesque build and the distinctively rounded vowels of his native Australia, the Time art critic Robert Hughes became as familiar a presence on television as he was in print.

headline.main: Robert Hughes, Eloquent and Combative Art Critic, Dies at 74
